column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Extremely adorable place! They don't have sugar free coffee syrups
column2: or soy milk (they have house made almond milk)
column3: and only sugar in the raw or Splenda choices to sweeten your drink (that was out and available).  I wasn't impressed with the taste of the coffee or my raisin scone
column4: both tasted burnt.  I might return and try the lunch because that looked good
column5: and I really want to like this place.
